animeDescription: Music video for the song Best Friend by Japanese boy band SMAP that was featured on NHK's Minna no Uta program. The video was animated by Toshio Nishiuchi and Hiromi Andou.
animeStaff: [['SMAP', ['Theme Song Performance']], ['Mori Hiromi', ['Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Nishiuchi Toshio', ['Animation Director']]]
